ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And neither are darkness and brightness!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nor are (depths of) darkness and light.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nor the darkness and the light,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: nor are the darkness and the light;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nor are the depths of Darkness and the Light;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nor are (alike) the darkness (disbelief) and the light (Belief in Islamic Monotheism).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Nor are the darkness and the light.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Nor are the darknesses and the light,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [35:20] nor darkness — disbelief — and light — faith;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nor is darkness (tantamount to) light) i.e. nor is disbelief like faith;
